	limit: 100,

source1 select(mapColumn(
		SoNum = VBELN,
		CreatedOn = ERDAT,
		CreatedBy = ERNAM,
		NetValue = NETWR
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectAndMap
SelectAndMap sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ToParquet
